plot: When an independent young artist finds a note suggesting her lover might be cheating, she plunges into an all-consuming and unconventional examination of the relationship and her own ability to love.
title: Everything Carries Me to You
plot_es: When an independent young artist finds a note suggesting her lover might be cheating, she plunges into an all-consuming and unconventional examination of the relationship and her own ability to love.
plot_en: When an independent young artist finds a note suggesting her lover might be cheating, she plunges into an all-consuming and unconventional examination of the relationship and her own ability to love.
